title: Perfect Watch
feature: A full-stack responsive web application for perfect watch providing companies having individual panel admin and user.
Normal users can see Pay, My order, Review option. Users can place orders and cancel their orders.
Admin can see the admin dashboard and manage product and order.
Admin crate a admin from user
technology: React Js, ES-6, CSS3, Bootstrap, Material UI, Node Js, Express Js, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku

title: Retina Eye
feature: Users can request an appointment with a specific doctor if they log in.
Users will be able to login or register with Google and Github.
If the user is logged-in, he will be able to make an appointment with a doctor.
technology: React Js, ES-6, CSS3, Bootstrap, Firebase,
